00031   typedef struct{

00033     int atom_num1;    
00034     int atom_num2;

00107     std::vector<bool>::const_iterator
00108     frag_atoms_flags_beg()
00109     { return frag_atoms.begin(); }
00110

00114     frag_atoms_flags_end()
00115     { return frag_atoms.end(); }
00116 
00120     const std::vector<atom_vci>&
00121     get_nbrs(const atom_vci atom) const 
00122     {
00123       if(atom < atoms_begin() || atom >= atoms_end()){
00124         warn(_fname, "get_nbrs", "Atom is not in the molecule");
00125         return A_nbrs_vec.back();
00126       }
00127       return *(A_nbrs_vec.begin() + (atom - atoms_begin()));
00128     }
00129 
00130 
00131     std::string
00132     atom_type_to_str(const atom_vci atom)
00133     { 
00134       typedef std::map<orbit_type, std::string> orbit_lvl;
00135       if(atom_types_to_str.size() == 0) init_atom_types_to_str();
00136       std::map<atom_type, orbit_lvl>::const_iterator atom_iter;
00137       atom_iter = atom_types_to_str.find(atom->name);
00138       if(atom_iter == atom_types_to_str.end()) return "Du.UNK";
00139       orbit_lvl::const_iterator orbit_iter;
00140       orbit_iter = atom_iter->second.find(atom->orbit);
00141       if(orbit_iter == atom_iter->second.end()) return "Du.UNK";
00142       return orbit_iter->second;
00143     }
00144 
00145     bool
00146     calc_charge_sums();
